title: Reduce $LEV Emission
body:
Regarding the current tokenomics , LEV emission is at 4 $LEV per block for an unlimited supply.

The Levyathan system is prepared to burn $LEV tokens when people buy/stake Indexes.
In a bearish market, few investors will continue to buy Indexes. $LEV price will continue to decrease.

-----

The current proposal suggests to reduce the $LEV emission to :
author: 0x31fc8cb2311d95CE2E4F35f60169d807Dac7e0f3
